cscie160.hw7.intf

Interface ATM

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ATMImpl

    public interface ATM
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Client/server RMI interface for ATM object.
    Author:
    Andy Kovtun

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int TIMEOUT_ABORT
      Time to wait after the warning was issued before dropping session
      static int TIMEOUT_WARNING
      Time to wait on inactive session before pushing a warning

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void authenticate(int accountNumber, java.lang.String PIN)
      Authenticate account with given number against the given PIN.
      void deposit(int accountNumber, float amount)
      Deposit a sum.
      void endSession()
      End client session gracefully
      java.lang.Float getBalance(int accountNumber)
      Get balance on account.
      void resetModel()
      Debug time API only, not for release: reset model (restore ATM and accounts states to initial)
      void startSession(ATMListener clientListener)
      Initiate a client session
      void transfer(int accountNumberFrom, int accountNumberTo, float amount)
      Transfer funds from account to account
      void withdraw(int accountNumber, float amount)
      Withdraw a sum.

        Returns:
        Balance value
        Throws:

      • withdraw

        void withdraw(int accountNumber,
            float amount)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Withdraw a sum.
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount to withdraw
        Throws:
        ATMException - Whenever business logics error occurs (access denied, amount negative, bad account number, insufficient funds)
        java.rmi.RemoteException - For generic RMI errors

      • transfer

        void transfer(int accountNumberFrom,
            int accountNumberTo,
            float amount)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Transfer funds from account to account
        Parameters:
        accountNumberFrom - "From" account number
        accountNumberTo - "To" account number
        amount - Amount to transfer
        Throws:
        ATMException - Whenever business logics error occurs (access denied, amount negative, bad account number, insufficient funds)
        java.rmi.RemoteException - For generic RMI errors

      • authenticate

        void authenticate(int accountNumber,
                java.lang.String PIN)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Authenticate account with given number against the given PIN. If successful, store its number in session so that client does not need to resubmit the PIN for each transaction.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber -
        PIN -
        Throws:
        ATMException - If session not started or authentication fails
        java.rmi.RemoteException - For generic RMI errors

      • startSession

        void startSession(ATMListener clientListener)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Initiate a client session
        Parameters:
        clientListener - Client listener
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • endSession

        void endSession()
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        End client session gracefully
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • resetModel

        void resetModel()
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Debug time API only, not for release: reset model (restore ATM and accounts states to initial)
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
